AWS Lambda

Summary

AWS service for Serverless Computing

Jots

Use Lambda to run single-execution scripts on-request rather than full persistent applications.

Use AWS Step Functions when you realizes your microservices shoulda been a monolith.

Lambda Layer

a ZIP archive with supplementary code or data for your layer

Why use layers?

smaller deployment packages

separate core logic from dependencies

share dependencies across multiple functions

use the Lambda console code editor

Working with Lambda layers - AWS Lambda

note

Okay this is what Jeramy Wilcox was referencing when he talked about “core” and “aviatrix” layers. I kinda knew that, but it’s nice to see it spelled out.

https://aws.amazon.com/pm/lambda/
